Job Posting:164759 - Position: S25 Développeur Solution Developer Co-op 164759 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/13/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/30/2025 09:59 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Ericsson 4333 Still Creek Drive Burnaby V5C 6S6 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Développeur Solution Developer Co-op 164759 Co-op Position Multiple Locations Canada 4 or 8 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Développeur Solution Developer Coop Job ID: 752950 Location: Montreal, Ottawa, Mississauga At this time, Ericsson Canada Inc. does not provide immigration assistance/sponsorship now or in the future for this position. About this opportunity Ericsson is enjoying extraordinary success with 5G, where we have been awarded major deals with all large operators across the globe. Together with our customers, we are designing and implementing the most sophisticated 5G networks in the market thanks to our technology leadership and our global scale in R&D, sales, and service delivery. Recently, Ericsson continued its pace of bringing innovation to the market with the launch of the Ericsson Cloud RAN, a rich new 5G RAN portfolio designed to be fully cloud native, using the experience of powering the most demanding 5G networks in the world, interworking with our extensive radio solution portfolio, adopting a rapidly growing telco infrastructure ecosystem. Over the next several years, we will enable exciting new services for consumers and enterprises and lead a new industrial revolution thanks to 5G. Now, we're seeking the best of the best to join us on this journey! What you will do: • Software development in a team with focus on innovation • Fast service development and deployment of Demos and POCs • Establish efficient ways of working, including methods and tools. Job Requirements You will bring: • Enrolled in a BS in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or equal • A genuine interest in technology, innovation and disruption • Experience with cloud native applications with exposure to private, public and hybrid cloud models • Knowledge of cloud native design • Knowledge of complex multi node system design • Knowledge of Radio Technologies is an advantage • Knowledge of Android and App development is an advantage Customer Insight • To be successful in this co-op you will need: • To be a team player • Experience in lean & agile ways of working • Strong communication skills and the ability to build relationships both internally and externally. • Fluent oral and written English and have excellent presentation skills • Knowledge sharing and Learning attitude Large degree of flexibility and willingness to take on different tasks and an attitude of "just fix it" • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://jobs.ericsson.com/careers/job/563121760775479 Please indicate your interest to apply to this position in SCOPE and also submit your application package via the online website portal. Please apply to this position as soon as possible, as the job posting may close before our set deadline.
